com.ktm_technologies.nlcmd

Class CommandSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<Object,MarkovChain>
        • com.ktm_technologies.nlcmd.CommandSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,MarkovChain>

    public class CommandSet
extends HashMap<Object,MarkovChain>
    Represents a set of commands, with each command being represented by a MarkovChain.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandSet

        public CommandSet(int order,
                  ScoreMode scoreMode)
        Create CommandSet object
        Parameters:
        order - Order for markov chains created via the CommandSet#put(String, String[]) method, that is number of relevant previous steps when matching
        scoreMode - See ScoreMode
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If order < 1

    • Method Detail

      • getScoreMode

        public ScoreMode getScoreMode()
        Returns:
        Current scoring algorithm, see ScoreMode

      • put

        public void put(Object key,
                String[] commands)
        Shortcut for adding markov chains
        Parameters:
        key - Identifier for this command
        commands - Training phrases for the markov chain

      • match

        public Object match(List<String> phrase)
        Match phrase against all commands and return key for best matching command markov chain.
        Parameters:
        phrase - Match phrase
        Returns:
        Key for best matching command or null
        See Also:
        MarkovChain.match(java.util.List<java.lang.String>)

      • scan

        public Object scan(List<String> phrase,
                   HashMap<List<String>,Double> matches,
                   HashMap<String,List<String>> placeholders)
        Scan phrase against all commands and return key for best matching command markov chain.
        Parameters:
        phrase - Match phrase
        matches - Map of sub-phrase matches and average probabilities
        placeholders - Map of matches placeholders and their actual input
        Returns:
        Key for best matching command or null
        See Also:
        MarkovChain.scan(java.util.List<java.lang.String>, java.util.HashMap<java.util.List<java.lang.String>, java.lang.Double>, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String, java.util.List<java.lang.String>>)
